answers.answer: I'm 35wks too & I know how you feel. My belly has measured out 4wks ahead of my due date since I was 28wks So I'm super huge & I've gained the proper amount of weight too.I've heard a lot of walking & sex helps bring on labor but I would try to wait 2 more weeks when you've reached 37wks So your baby is technically full term.I'm sorry you're so miserable though.So glad my c section is in 16 days!
As someone that had a baby at 35 weeks I'm going to tell you NICU is a horrible experience

I would wait to start self-inducing until 37 weeks. I know you're eager. I am, too, and I'm 36w2d. However, when you fo start inducing, SEX. It's the most natural way of inducing I can think of. The seminal fluid thins and irritates the cervix and the rocking and contractions of orgasm can cause actual contractions for you. Best of luck, hun.

I'm 35 tom also and I feel the same way I wish I could start trying everything now to bring on labor I'm gonna wait until Dr gives me the ok though I'm already gonna be induced around 38 wks due to gestational  diabetes and my son measuring ahead so I'm hoping my body will do it on its on at 37 not much longer momma hang in there

I don't think you want to go into labor just yet!  Try to wait until at least 37 or 38 weeks. I had my  daughter at 34 weeks and she spent 2 weeks in the nicu; longest 2 weeks of my life! Its a heart crushing feeling when you have to leave the hospital with no baby. Not saying that will happen you but try to wait a couple more weeks before trying to induce your labor!I'm 36 weeks and miserable as well but hang in there! :)

37 weeks tomorrow and feel the same way! Can't wait to be done with this pregnancy and get my body back! I am starting to try a few things, but going to kick it up after Christmas. I got the OK from my midwife to start using evening primrose oil to soften and thin my cervix at 36 weeks. I am super sick right now, though, so I'm trying to get better before I have my baby.

question: Is it selfish to wanna go into labour early? I'm so huge and drained I can't take it no more! I can barely breathe let alone walk or lie down properly!! Whats brings on labour quicker does any1 know???
title: 35 wks tomoro..
